web_snippets: Bradford Health Services has hired Rob Marsh as its new CEO. A behavioral health veteran, Marsh joined the Alabama-based company in May.
... Rob Marsh's profile on LinkedIn, a professional community of 1 billion members ... “Rob is a rare combination of high-level performer and cool-under-fire ...
Since leaving a career in the U.S. Army, Rob Marsh (Col '78) has devoted his life to serving as a country doctor in Virginia's Shenandoah Valley.
